#summary Summary of settings of this software

===Display Tab===
  * "Measurement system"
  Select "Measurement system" for display notation. (either "Metric" or "Imperial", default "Metric")
  * "Coordinate format"
  Select "Coordinate format" for display notation. (either "DDD째MM'SS.SS", "DDD째MM.MMMM" or "DDD.DDDDD째", default "DDD째MM'SS.SS")
  * "Items"
  
  * "Shortcuts"
  Select whether to use Keyboard shortcuts. (default "Enabled")
===Output Tab===
  * "Autostart"
  Select whether to begin the GPS logging automatically when this software is begun. 
  "Disabled"/"NMEA"/"GPX"/"KML"
  * "Memory in use"
  * "Intervals"
  "none"/"1"/"5"/"10"/"15"/"20"/"30"/"60"
  * "Horizontal distance"
  "none"/"10"/"20"/"25"/"50"/"100"/"200"/"250"/"500"/"1000"
  * "Auto pause(H.Speed)(Speed)(H.Acc)(HDOP)(PDOP)"
===NMEA Tab===
  * "File Name(Ext)"
  * "Sentences"
  "GPGGA"/"GPGLL"/"GPGSA"/"GPGST"/"GPGSV"/"GPRMC"/"GPVTG"/"GPZDA"/"Other"
===GPX Tab===
  * "File Name(Ext)"
  * "Tags"
  "time/"/"ele"/"course"/"speed"/"fix"/"sat"/"hdop"/"vdop"/"pdop"
===KML Tab===
  * "File Name(Ext)"
  * "Placemark(Name)"
  "None"/"Point"/"TimeStamp(UTC)"/"TimeStamp(Local)"
  * "Placemark(Description)"
